author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-7424] Enable the DeltaEncoding for the HFileOutputFormat

Summary: HFileOutputFormat has a writer embedded but it is not configured to use the DeltaEncoding and FavoredNodes. This revision is to add that support to the HFileOutputFormat while it is used as an OutputFormat either the Mapper or the Reducer for a MapReduce task.
Test Plan: Adding Unit Tests to test the working of the HFileOutputFormat

author: liyin
msg: Summary: The Test is polling for the .META. table and failing after a certain number of retries with a PreemptiveFastFailException. Catching that exception in the Test since it only knows about RetriesExhaustedException and catches that.
Test Plan: Ensuring that the Unit Tests pass consistently.

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-6368] Remove use of deprecated guava functions
It would be nice to be able to use Guava version 14, for some of the new classes, e.g. Range classes.  So first we need to make sure we don't use any of the deprecated functions.
Test Plan: Compile and run tests.

author: liyin
msg: [Master] Print locality and dispersion for the current assignment plan in a specific format
added a method which will allow printing locality and
dispersion per table in the same format like in HBaseLocalityCheck
tested on tsh25, sample output of 1 table:
13/01/03 15:10:47 INFO master.RegionPlacement: For Table: MailBox_cell5_v1 ; #Total Regions: 1760 ; The average locality for primary is 69.59913 %
13/01/03 15:10:47 INFO master.RegionPlacement: For Table: MailBox_cell5_v1 ; #Total Regions: 1760 ; The average locality for secondary is 4.718978 %
13/01/03 15:10:47 INFO master.RegionPlacement: For Table: MailBox_cell5_v1 ; #Total Regions: 1760 ; The average locality for tertiary is 4.8160424 %
13/01/03 15:10:47 INFO master.RegionPlacement: For Table: MailBox_cell5_v1 ; #Total Regions: 1760 ; The average dispersion score is 1.0

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-7511] Export preads latency metrics from HRegionServer metrics
HBase already populates the preads latencies at HFile level but does not
export it via jmx. This change exports the fsPreadlatency metrics.
It also gets rid of the fsReadLatency metrics because these are not
populated as HBase now does only preads.
Tested on hbase817.ash3 with custom build. After RS restart the metrics
